songs.description: Chill, mellow lofi for late-night study sessions

songs.name: sunset-drive
songs.description: Nostalgic lofi for golden hour cruising - warm Rhodes chords, mellow bass, laid-back drums

songs.name: midnight-cafe
songs.description: Chromatic descent lofi (Ebmaj7->Dm7->Dbmaj7->Cm7) - wurlitzer with tremolo, vinyl crackle ambience

songs.name: neon-dreams
songs.description: Futuristic city lofi (Fm9->Dbmaj7->Abmaj7->Eb7) - arpeggiated synths, 82 BPM, highest tempo

visuals.name: particles
visuals.description: Bass-triggered particle bursts with mid wind and high sparkles

visuals.name: aurora
visuals.description: Aurora borealis with flowing ribbon bands, audio-reactive colors and sparkle effects

visuals.name: neon-rain
visuals.description: Cyberpunk-inspired neon rain with reflections and city glow

visuals.name: flow-field
visuals.description: Organic particle flow driven by Perlin noise - creates river-like movement

visuals.name: neon-grid
visuals.description: Cyberpunk perspective grid with frequency bars, floating shapes, and glitch effects - pairs with neon-dreams
